css: .cover-online-marketing-webinar-section { padding: 6rem 0; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f7fa 0%, #c3cfe2 100%); text-align: center; } .container { max-width: 900px; margin: 0 auto; } h1 { font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 3.5rem); margin-bottom: 1rem; } .subtitle { max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto 2rem; } .btn-primary { display: inline-block; padding: 1rem 2.5rem; background-color: var(--color-primary); color: var(--color-light); border-radius: 0.5rem; text-decoration: none; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); margin-bottom: 3rem; } .image-wrapper { border-radius: 1.5rem; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .image-wrapper img { width: 100%; display: block; }

de.name: Online Marketing Webinar
de.title: Steigere deinen Online-Umsatz
de.subtitle: Erfahre Strategien von Top-Marken. Begrenzte Plätze.

en.name: Online Marketing Webinar
en.title: Boost Your Online Sales
en.subtitle: Learn strategies from top brands. Limited spots.
